TextLang.Text: . ﻩﺩﻮﺟﻮﻣ ﺚﻳﺪﺤﺗ ﺮﺧﺃ ﺕﺎﻧﺎﻴﺑ . ﺖﻴﺒﺜﺘﻟا ﺃﺪﺒﻳ ﻭ ﺞﻣﺎﻧﺮﺒﻟا ﻦﻣ ﺝﺮﺨﻴﺳ ﻡﺎﻈﻨﻟا
The latest update data for this software has been found. To sign in and use this software, you must update the software to the latest version. The system will quit the software and start installing.
To use this software, you must update the system software. The system will quit this software and start a system software update.
Downloading the latest update data... It is recommended that you use this software after the download is completed. To check the status of the download, go to [Network] > [Download Management].
An error occurred during communication with the server. This is a DNS error.
A connection to the server could not be established.
This operation cannot be performed during remote play.
Checking for update data... Please wait.
An error occurred during connection to the server. A connection to the HTTP proxy server could not be established.
The server may currently be down for maintenance or updating. Try again later.
